name: Amazon RDS PostgreSQL Database
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS RDS PostgreSQL master database instance with options for a single instance or multi-az instances.

name: Amazon RDS MySQL Database
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS RDS MySQL master database instance with options for a single instance or multi-az instances.

name: Amazon RDS MariaDB Database
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS RDS MariaDB master database instance with options for a single instance or multi-az instances.

name: Amazon RDS Microsoft SQL Database
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS RDS Microsoft SQL master database instance with options for a single instance or multi-az instances.

name: Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
description: This product builds a multi-availability zone Amazon AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) with an option to include a single instance Amazon Linux bastion instance.

name: Amazon S3 Public Bucket with Read Only Access
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS S3 bucket with options for read only bucket with public access from any source.

name: Amazon S3 Private Bucket with CIDR Restricted Access
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS S3 bucket with private access accessible from a restricted source.

name: Amazon S3 Private Encrypted Bucket
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS S3 bucket encrypted with private access accessible from any source.

name: Amazon S3 Private Bucket with MFA Delete Restrictions
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS S3 bucket with multi-factor authentication restricted bucket delete option.

name: Amazon S3 Private Bucket with Transition Ruleset
description: This product builds an Amazon AWS S3 bucket with a transition ruleset to S3-IA and Glacier.

name: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) Linux
description: This product builds one Amazon Linux EC2 instance and create a SSM patch baseline, maintenance window, and patch task to scan for and install operating system updates the EC2 instance.

name: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) Windows
description: This product builds one Microsoft Windows EC2 instance and create a SSM patch baseline,  maintenance window,  and patch task to scan for and install operating system updates on the EC2 instance.

name: Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR)
description: This product builds an Amazon Elastic MapReduce cluster with 1 master nodes and 2 core nodes.

name: AWS Glue crawler
description: This product creates a glue crawler

name: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) Linux NGINX Webserver
description: This product builds one Amazon Linux EC2 webserver NGINX instance.

name: EMR cluster for Spark or S3 backed Hbase
description: This product builds an Amazon Elastic MapReduce cluster for Spark or S3 backed Hbase best practices.

name: Amazon ECS task
description: This product creates a simple ECS task for Fargate.

name: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) Linux Apache Webserver
description: This product builds one Amazon Linux EC2 webserver Apache instance.

name: ECS Fargate Cluster
description: This product builds an ECS cluster for Fargate.
